title: Strengthening AI Practical Skills: Mathematical Modeling and Strategy Through Australian Rules Football Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Quantify spatial utilization and player interaction patterns using match simulation data
Analyze the impact of match constraints (field size, player density, etc.) on statistical performance metrics (shot success rate, pass accuracy)
Apply network theory to calculate pass network centrality and variability, enabling mathematical evaluation of team strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
